text: Uha unham nu pukaranage ki ki asim tuhade nala nahiâ€ si?Uha kahinage ki ham, paratu tusim apane apa nu kurahe pa'i'a ate raha dekhade rahe ate saka vica pa'e rahe ate jhuthi'am umidam ne tuhanu dhokhe vica rakhi'a. Ithom taka ki alaha da faisala a gi'a. Ate munakaram ne tuhanu alaha de mamale vica dhokha dita
